title: Anthropic’s Unprecedented Dive into Artificial Neural Networks Behavior Study
description: In a monumental stride towards unraveling the mysteries of artificial intelligence, Anthropic PBC has disclosed a breakthrough that could redefine the landscape of AI development. title: Ripple Ecosystem to Receive Game-Changing AMM Feature, Revolutionizing the Blockchain Market – Can it Drive XRP Price to $5?
description: David Schwartz, Ripple’s CTO, encourages the implementation of an Automated Market Maker (AMM) feature in the XRP Ledger (XRPL), contingent upon obtaining community consensus. Schwartz delineates that if a majority is attained post-debate and validation, AMM functionality could potentially go live in a brisk two-week timeframe following approval.
